-K3f5dGjhC4cHT7Rwd0P.story: Shrek is love shrek is life

-K3fXRiLWStMUXbfkYYO.story:
Juan Dela Cruz is a 58 year old man who lives in Mindoro. He just bought a half hectare of land with the money he saved of years of farming alongside his family. 

When it was in the middle of the season, they lost most of their crops because of continuous rain in the area. The land he got was slightly lower than the 

surrounding so the water came rushing down his land destroying the crops he and his family worked so hard to grow and cultivate. They are now only scraping by by 

asking friends and family for help.
